title: The return of the media brand
description: For almost 20 years, publishers have optimized for distribution and monetization. In 2026, the focus shifts to something more foundational: brand. Over the last few years, publishers have watched their major distribution partners, first social and now search, become volatile and unreliable. Constant shifts have weakened the relationship between publishers and the platforms that once...
